con:request.name: AddUser
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:arr="http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization/Arrays" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:acr4="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v5.Common">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:AddUser>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr3:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr3:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr3:User>\r <acr4:AlertEmailList xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr4:CellPhoneNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr4:Department>Test Dept</acr4:Department>\r <acr4:Email>${CustomerEmail}</acr4:Email>\r <acr4:HeadCashier xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr4:HierarchyRoleId>${GetHierarchyRoleList#Response#declare namespace b='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common'; declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Responses'; //ns1:GetHierarchyRoleListResponse[1]/ns1:GetHierarchyRoleListResult[1]/a:HierarchyRoleList[1]/b:HierarchyRole[1]/b:HierarchyRoleId[1]}</acr4:HierarchyRoleId>\r <acr4:InvoiceOption>4</acr4:InvoiceOption>\r <acr4:IsLockedOut>false</acr4:IsLockedOut>\r <acr4:Name>Test User</acr4:Name>\r <acr4:ParameterList>\r <acr4:MerchantUserParameter>\r <acr4:Name>Zip Code</acr4:Name>\r <acr4:Option>1</acr4:Option>\r <acr4:SendEmailAlert>false</acr4:SendEmailAlert>\r <acr4:TriggerAmount>0</acr4:TriggerAmount>\r </acr4:MerchantUserParameter>\r <acr4:MerchantUserParameter>\r <acr4:Name>Billing Address</acr4:Name>\r <acr4:Option>1</acr4:Option>\r <acr4:SendEmailAlert>false</acr4:SendEmailAlert>\r <acr4:TriggerAmount>0</acr4:TriggerAmount>\r </acr4:MerchantUserParameter>\r <acr4:MerchantUserParameter>\r <acr4:Name>CVV</acr4:Name>\r <acr4:Option>1</acr4:Option>\r <acr4:SendEmailAlert>false</acr4:SendEmailAlert>\r <acr4:TriggerAmount>0</acr4:TriggerAmount>\r </acr4:MerchantUserParameter>\r </acr4:ParameterList>\r <acr4:Password>P@ssw0rd</acr4:Password>\r <acr4:PrivilegeList>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Adjustment</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Administration</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Auth</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Credit</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Force</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>SpecialForce</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>MOTO</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Reprint</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Return</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>SpecialReturn</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Reconciliation</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Posting</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Settlement</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Activate</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Reload</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>BalanceCheck</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>ForcePrepaidSale</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>RecurringSale</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>ForcePrepaidMOTO</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>RecurringSale2</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Industries</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Industry</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>QuickVoid</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>QuickRefund</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>QuickForce</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>ProcessCheck</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>ItemBatch</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>CheckDeposit</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>RepeatCheck</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>PendingInvoice</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>SupervisorApproval</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>CheckSummary</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Discounts</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>Discount</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>CheckCredit</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>PositiveCardAuthorization</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>EBPPMarkAsPaid</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>WebPayReport</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r <acr4:Name>PartialReversal</acr4:Name>\r </acr4:MerchantUserPrivilege>\r </acr4:PrivilegeList>\r <acr4:ReceiptType>2</acr4:ReceiptType>\r <acr4:SharedDrawer>false</acr4:SharedDrawer>\r <acr4:UserId>testuserid</acr4:UserId>\r </acr3:User>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:AddUser>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
